description: This table contains the history of edits for dental procedure records.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENTAL_PATIENT_CSN
columns.description: Stores the patient encounter in which a particular contact of the record was modified if it was available.

columns.name: DENTAL_MOD_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who modified the procedure record.

columns.name: DENTAL_MOD_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time when dental procedure record was modified.

columns.name: DENTAL_ARCH_HIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the revision history of the arch for a procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Upper


Lower

columns.name: DENTAL_QUAD_HIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the revision history of the quadrant for a procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Upper Right


Upper Left


Lower Left


Lower Right

columns.name: DENTAL_EAP_HIST_ID
columns.description: Stores the revision history of the procedure record for a dental procedure.

columns.name: DENT_COMP_INST_HIST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the revision history of when a procedure is completed

columns.name: PROC_STAT_HIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column keeps track of how status of a procedure changes over time.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Planned


Completed


Canceled


Planning


Discontinued

columns.name: DENT_VISIT_HIST_ID
columns.description: This column keeps track of the visit that contains the procedure over time.

columns.name: PROCEDURE_NUMBER
columns.description: This column keeps track of the relative order of a procedure within a visit over time.

columns.name: DENT_CHRON_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This is the date and time the documentation was made for, such as when documenting past historical data.

columns.name: DENTAL_COMP_PROV_HX_ID
columns.description: This column contains the history of recorded providers that completed the dental procedure. This is based on the service provider of the charge.

columns.name: DENT_TTH_AREA_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
This determines the history of the part of the tooth that a procedure or finding affects.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Root


Surface


Crown


Full Tooth

columns.name: DENT_PLN_VIS_NUM_HX
columns.description: This item stores the historical values of the planned visit for a procedure.

columns.name: DENTAL_B_PROV_HX_ID
columns.description: This column contains the history of the recorded billing provider for the dental procedure. This can be different from the service or completing provider.

columns.name: DENT_PLAN_PRL_HX_ID
columns.description: History of the treatment template to be used when the user creates a treatment plan for the dental procedure

columns.name: DENT_PLAN_PRL_HX_ID_PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The SmartSet/Protocol record name.  This is different from the display name, which is stored in CL_PRL_SS_OT.DISPLAY_NAME.

columns.name: DENT_RMV_RSN_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The history of the reason an existing procedure was removed from a patient's tooth chart.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Wrong Patient


Added in Error

columns.name: DENT_PROC_HX_IMP_ID
columns.description: This item stores the implant record ID historically linked to a dental procedure.

columns.name: DENTAL_AREA_HIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
History of the area of the oral cavity that a dental procedure is performed on.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Entire oral cavity


Maxillary arch


Mandibular arch


Upper right quadrant


Upper left quadrant


Lower left quadrant


Lower right quadrant

columns.name: DENTAL_ORD_HX_ID
columns.description: This column contains the history of the linked order record for a dental procedure.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_NOTE_HX_ID
columns.description: Historical ID of the note (HNO) record that served as this dental procedure's Completion Details note

columns.name: DENT_TRIG_PROC_HX_ID
columns.description: The original triggering procedure for alternatives history.

columns.name: LINKED_BRIDGE_PROC_HX
columns.description: Linked bridge ID history for a bridge procedure

columns.name: DENT_PROC_SUBSTATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item keeps track of how the substatus of a procedure changes over time. This is the category ID.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DENT_AREA_INACTV_HX_YN
columns.description:
Tracks the audit history of whether a non-teeth procedure should be considered inactive.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
